channel.title: Writing on Roblog
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on Roblog

item.title: The Beginning
item.description: This is the first chapter of The Shepherd King, written as part of NaNoWriMo. There is a tall mountain above it, and a glacier. But there are countless mountains in Anaria. Almost everything is in a mountain, or on a mountain, or in the shadows of mountains. It is in a valley, but nearly all the dwelling places of men in that land lie in valleys of some kind or another.
